red_wines.name: Cabernet Sauvignon
red_wines.description: Bold, full-bodied, with dark fruit flavors and firm tannins.

red_wines.name: Merlot
red_wines.description: Smooth and medium-bodied with plum, black cherry, and herbal notes.

red_wines.name: Pinot Noir
red_wines.description: Light-bodied with red berry flavors and earthy undertones.

red_wines.name: Zinfandel
red_wines.description: Jammy and fruit-forward with spicy and peppery notes.

red_wines.name: Syrah/Shiraz
red_wines.description: Rich and full-bodied with dark fruit flavors, pepper, and smoky notes.

red_wines.name: Malbec
red_wines.description: Deep-colored with blackberry, plum, and chocolate flavors.

red_wines.name: Sangiovese
red_wines.description: The backbone of Chianti, featuring cherry, tomato, and herbal flavors.

red_wines.name: Tempranillo
red_wines.description: Spain’s signature grape, offering red fruit, tobacco, and leather notes.

white_wines.name: Chardonnay
white_wines.description: Buttery and oaky or crisp and citrusy, depending on the style.

white_wines.name: Sauvignon Blanc
white_wines.description: Crisp and refreshing with grassy, citrus, and tropical notes.

white_wines.name: Riesling
white_wines.description: Aromatic and high-acid, ranging from dry to sweet.

white_wines.name: Pinot Grigio/Pinot Gris
white_wines.description: Light and zesty with green apple and pear flavors.

white_wines.name: Gewürztraminer
white_wines.description: Floral and spicy, often off-dry, with lychee and honeysuckle notes.

white_wines.name: Viognier
white_wines.description: Rich and aromatic with peach, apricot, and floral notes.

rose_wines.name: Provence Rosé
rose_wines.description: Light, dry, and crisp with red berry and citrus flavors.

rose_wines.name: White Zinfandel
rose_wines.description: Sweet and fruity with strawberry and melon notes.
